extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Veeam Backup & Replication Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the Veeam Backup & Replication version is vulnerable by checking the installed version and build date.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Veeam Backup & Replication version vulnerable?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update Veeam Backup & Replication to a supported and fixed version: Version 12 (build 12.0.0.1420 P20230223) or Version 11a (build 11.0.1.1261 P20230227).

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the deployment an all-in-one Veeam appliance with no remote backup infrastructure components?

extracted_playbook.title: Block External Connections to Port TCP 9401
extracted_playbook.description: As a temporary remediation, block external connections to port TCP 9401 in the backup server firewall until the patch is installed.

affected_products: Veeam Backup & Replication versions prior to 12.0.0.1420 P20230223 and 11.0.1.1261 P20230227
